title: The benefits code: benefits and reimbursed expenses not chargeable to tax: table

details.body:
## Part 4 ITEPA 2003 The following benefits and expenses reimbursed are not chargeable to tax under Part 3 Chapter 10 ITEPA 2003, mostly because of exemptions within Part 4 ITEPA 2003 but also by deduction (e.g. security assets and services). In the table all section references are to ITEPA 2003.
**Benefits not chargeable**  **Legislation** **Relevant Instructions**
Accommodation, supplies and services provided and used on the employer's premises Section 316 [EIM21610](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21610.htm)
Annual parties and other social events Section 264 [EIM21670](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21670.htm) onwards
Bicycles Section 244 [EIM21664](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21664.htm)
Car, motor cycle and bicycle parking facilities at or near the place of work Section 237 [EIM21685](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21685.htm)
Childcare See “Employer supported childcare” [EIM21900](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21900.htm)
Entertainment provided by third parties Section 265 [EIM21835](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21835.htm)
Equipment provided to employees with a disability Section 210 [EIM21846](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21846.htm)
Heavier commercial vehicles Section 238 [EIM22900](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM22900.htm) onwards
Leave travel facilities of members of the Armed Forces Section 296 [EIM21733](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21733.htm)
Meals in a canteen provided for employer's staff generally Section 317 [EIM21670](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21670.htm) onwards
Medical treatment necessary when employee falls ill on duties abroad Section 325 [EIM21766](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21766.htm)
Pool cars Section 167(2) [EIM23450](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM23450.htm)
Provision of a pension or similar benefit to be given on death or retirement Section 307 [EIM21800](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21800.htm)
Reimbursed expenses of a provided car Section 239(1) [EIM23035](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM23035.htm)
Security assets and services where special threat to employee Sections 377 [EIM21810](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21810.htm) onwards
Sick pay schemes: employers' contributions Section 202(3) [EIM21820](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21820.htm)
Sports facilities Section 261 [EIM21825](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21825.htm) onwards
Structural alterations to provided living accommodation Section 313 [EIM21620](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21620.htm)
Supplies and services other than on an employer's premises Section 316(4) [EIM21611](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21611.htm) onwards
Workplace nurseries Section 318 [EIM21900](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21900.htm) onwards
Works buses and subsidies to public bus services Sections 242 and 243 [EIM21850](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21850.htm) and [EIM21855](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21855.htm)
